results.title: The right place for metformin today.
results.text_hl: Although a randomized placebo controlled CVOT with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is lacking, many observational studies in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary heart disease@@@, @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@ and @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@chronic kidney disease@@@ have demonstrated consistent beneficial effects.

results.text_hl: As for the fifth cluster, we concluded the potential positive effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on reducing @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@CHD@@@ risk factors in @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: Effect of metformin on cardiovascular risk factors in middle-aged Thai women with metabolic syndrome: A randomized placebo-controlled trial.
results.text_hl: The significant improvements found only in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group were body mass index, fasting blood @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@, high-sensitivity @GENE_CRP @GENE_1401 @@@C-reactive protein@@@ and 10-year risk of @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary heart disease@@@ (Framingham heart study) (P = 0.0004, P = 0.049, P = 0.035 and P = 0.029); whereas that only in the placebo group was high density lipoprotein cholesterol.
